snippet.title: ABYSS X ZERO - Official Extended Gameplay Trailer | Future of Play 2024
snippet.description:
Explore an expansive world in this 3D Metroidvania with carefully crafted dungeons and stylish low-poly visuals, inspired by classics of the 32 and 64 bit generation.

Take control of two different characters, fated to battle each other: Codename A and Codename Z: They both have unique abilities that change how you fight and interact with the environment.
